checker
Class CommentLine

java.lang.Object
  checker.CommentLine

public class CommentLine
extends java.lang.Object

Comment line of a source code without any surrounding characters.
Never contains a newline character. If single source code line has multiple comments, create a new CommentLine object for each comment.

Constructor Detail

CommentLine

public CommentLine(java.lang.String line,
                   int sourceLineNumber,
                   int commentStartColumn)
Parameters:
line - Comment line without surrounding characters.
sourceLineNumber - Line number in the source file.
commentStartColumn - Column in the file where the comments start (number of characters that have been stripped from the beginning of the line)

CommentLine

public CommentLine(java.lang.String line,
                   int lineNumber)
Constructor for lines of license files. (commentStartColumn will be 0)

Parameters:
line - Normal line of the license file.
lineNumber - Line number in the license file.
